description: This file contains a Java class CustomUserDetails implementing Spring Security's UserDetails interface, used for managing user authentication and authorization details within a user management backend.

classes.name: CustomUserDetails
classes.description: A custom implementation of Spring Security's UserDetails to adapt application User data for security context.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Factory method to create CustomUserDetails instance from a User entity, assigning a default role.

methods.name: getAuthorities
methods.description: Returns the authorities granted to the user.

methods.name: getUsername
methods.description: Returns the user's email as username.

methods.name: isAccountNonExpired
methods.description: Indicates whether the user's account has expired.

methods.name: isAccountNonLocked
methods.description: Indicates whether the user's account is locked.

methods.name: isCredentialsNonExpired
methods.description: Indicates whether the user's credentials have expired.

methods.name: isEnabled
methods.description: Indicates whether the user is enabled.
